graphql.query:
mutation ($payload:CciCreateSystemInput!)
{
	cciCreateSystem (payload:$payload)
	{
		id
		tenantCode
		version
		name
		environment
		technology
		isActive
		cancelledAt
		createdAt
		updatedAt
	}
}

graphql.query:
query ($query:QueryStatement)
{
	cciGetSystems (query: $query)
	{
		id
		tenantCode
		version
		name
		environment
		technology
		isActive
		cancelledAt
		createdAt
		updatedAt
	}
}

query ($query:QueryStatement)
{
	cciFindSystem (query: $query)
	{
		id
		tenantCode
		version
		name
		environment
		technology
		isActive
		cancelledAt
		createdAt
		updatedAt
	}
}

query ($id:ID)
{
	cciFindSystemById (id:$id)
	{
		id
		tenantCode
		version
		name
		environment
		technology
		isActive
		cancelledAt
		createdAt
		updatedAt
	}
}

mutation ($payload:CciUpdateSystemInput!)
{
	cciUpdateSystem (payload:$payload)
	{
		id
		tenantCode
		version
		name
		environment
		technology
		isActive
		cancelledAt
		createdAt
		updatedAt
	}
}

mutation ($id:ID!)
{
	cciDeleteSystemById (id:$id)
	{
		id
		tenantCode
		version
		name
		environment
		technology
		isActive
		cancelledAt
		createdAt
		updatedAt
	}
}

mutation ($query:QueryStatement)
{
	cciDeleteSystems (query: $query)
	{
		id
		tenantCode
		version
		name
		environment
		technology
		isActive
		cancelledAt
		createdAt
		updatedAt
	}
}
